title: League music
body: Maybe someone at league can get to work with a kpop group to write up a theme song that's motivating and inspiring. Then at worlds they can perform the kpop act in some character costumes.

replies.body:
If you weren't already aware, they have a theme for worlds every year that is usually accompanied by an animation, and is usually played live at Worlds in the opening ceremony! Last years was a special treat with an appearance from Elder Dragon ;)

2014, Warriors by imagine Dragons: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fmI_Ndrxy14
2015, Worlds Collide ft Nicki Taylor: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Twd965VzX4
2016, Ignite by Zedd: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Zasx9hjo4WY
2017, Legends Never Die ft. Against The Current: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r6zIGXun57U
2018, RISE ft. The Glitch Mob, Mako and The World Alive: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fB8TyLTD7EE
Looks like I predicted it mate. Legends never die. Gifts plz for predictions. KDA Ahri :D {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
